mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.post_id AS postId, c.user_id AS userId, c.content, c.image_url AS imageUrl, c.created_at AS createdAt, u.username AS authorUsername, u.avatar_url AS authorAvatarUrl FROM comments c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.created_at ASC

SELECT c.id, c.post_id AS postId, c.user_id AS userId, c.content, c.image_url AS imageUrl, c.created_at AS createdAt, u.username AS authorUsername, u.avatar_url AS authorAvatarUrl FROM comments c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (post_id, user_id, content, image_url, created_at) VALUES (#{postId}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{imageUrl}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.post_id AS postId, c.user_id AS userId, c.content, c.image_url AS imageUrl, c.created_at AS createdAt, u.username AS authorUsername, u.avatar_url AS authorAvatarUrl, p.title AS postTitle FROM comments c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN posts p ON c.post_id = p.id WHERE u.username = #{username} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
